diff_hunk:
@@ -394,6 +395,24 @@ def test_grad_penalty_acgan(self):
   def test_grad_penalty_callable_acgan(self):
     self._test_grad_penalty_helper(create_callable_acgan_model)
 
+  def test_grad_penalty_one_sided_gan(self):
body: I strongly applaud your desire to write good tests, but `_test_grad_penalty_helper` only checks that the result is the right kind of object. We don't check a multiple options on other losses, so I don't see these tests as necessary. On the other hand, test-bloat is something to consider. @lgeiger do you have strong feelings on whether to keep or remove these tests? @rmlarsen @sguada do you have thoughts?
